title: Autodetect www. urls as absolute links in st.column_config.LinkColumn

labels.name: type:enhancement
labels.description: Requests for feature enhancements or new features

body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have searched the [existing issues](https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues) for similar issues.
- [X] I added a very descriptive title to this issue.
- [X] I have provided sufficient information below to help reproduce this issue.

### Summary

Continuing the discussion from [How to display a clickable link pandas dataframe](https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/how-to-display-a-clickable-link-pandas-dataframe/32612/6):

Summary

I am using st.column_config.LinkColumn(‚ÄúLink column‚Äù) to make my links inside my dataframe clickable, streamlit is but doing the following and adding this bit to my links:

Normal Link:

[www.xx-xxxxxx.de/xxxxxx.html](http://www.xx-xxxxxx.de/xxxxxx.html)

After applying st.column_config.LinkColumn(‚ÄúLink column‚Äù) the label of the link remains the same, but the link itself changes to this an the page don‚Äôt open:

https://username-appname-appname-xxxxxx.streamlit.app/~/+/www.xx-xxxxxx.de/xxxxxx.html

Code snippet:

            st.dataframe(df,
                         column_config={
                            "Number": st.column_config.NumberColumn(format="%d"),
                             "Link": st.column_config.LinkColumn("Link")
                            }
                         )
                         
I have added to the links the following:

        df["Link"] = "https://"+df["Link"]

and it solve the problem. Maybe adding a feature to recognise any type of url? starts with www.

### Reproducible Code Example

```Python
st.dataframe(df,
                         column_config={
                             "Link": st.column_config.LinkColumn("Link")
                            }
                         )
```


### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Expected Behavior

For any link to work. Just click and the page opens.

### Current Behavior

https://username-appname-appname-xxxxxx.streamlit.app/~/+/www.xx-xxxxxx.de/xxxxxx.html


### Is this a regression?

- [ ] Yes, this used to work in a previous version.
